mapper.select: select sum(totalprice),to_char(orderdate,'MM') from orders where to_char(orderdate,'yyyy')=#{year} group by to_char(orderdate,'MM') order by to_char(orderdate,'yyyy-MM-dd')

select sum(totalprice), to_char(orderdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') from orders where orderdate>=#{startDay}
and orderdate<to_date(#{endDay})+1 group by to_char(orderdate,'yyyy-MM-dd') order by to_char(orderdate,'yyyy-MM-dd')
